sections.heading: Still curious about me?
content: I'm a tech ops leader turned UX engineer under mentorship of Perpetual Education.
My colleagues affectionately call me detail-obsessed, but I say I'm a fan of a job well&nbspdone.
On my free time, you'll find me baking or diving into a new productivity hack, but that's not why you're here.
How may I bring your designs to life today?
